DataElement.preferredName: Patient Past 30 Days Energy Assessment Awaken Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A numeric score measure of the patient's energy assessment in the past 30 days while awake.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Past 30 Days Energy Physical Examination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._The capacity of a physical system to do work._A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.:The capacity of a physical system to do work.:A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.
The capacity of a physical system to do work.

A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: . OK to release per KM. AK 2020-10-19

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The capacity of a physical system to do work._To wake up or become awake._An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 9 and less than 11 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of nine and one.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 9 and less than 11 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of nine and one.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A mathematical element that when added to another number yields the same number; the cardinal number meaning one less than one.

Concepts.definition: A mathematical element that when added to another number yields the same number; the cardinal number meaning one less than one.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.

ReferenceDocuments.name: What is the numeric score mea
ReferenceDocuments.description: What is the numeric score measure of the patient's energy assessment in the past 30 days while awake?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Please give a number between 0 and 10 that describes your usual energy level while awake in the last month?
